fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Prototype Amber, Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Ocean-hued Clam <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Healing Bonus +15%.
• When the character with this artifact set heals a party member, 1 Foam will appear. It accumulates healed HP for 3 seconds, then explodes and deals 90% of the HP healed as DMG to nearby enemies. Max accumulated healing is 30,000 HP, including over-heal. There can only be 1 Foam active, but it stays even if you swap out. Foam CD is 3.5s.

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Maiden Beloved <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Increases Healing done by 15%
• Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

fields.name: Third Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
